channel.title: Battlefield runescape client error
channel.description:
hey, bfrs is a server wich i've to run with netbeans. so i run it then i got no problem when i try to log in it tells me this error
[code]SEVERE: An error occurred in an executor service! The server will be halted immediately. java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "Back To Basics" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.java:65) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:492) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:527) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.Player.<init>(Player.java:46) at org.hyperion.rs2.GenericWorldLoader.checkLogin(GenericWorldLoader.java:63) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$3.run(World.java:370) at org.hyperion.rs2.GameEngine$4.run(GameEngine.java:161) at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:471) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(FutureTask.java:334) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:166) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1145) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:615) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)[/code]

Do back_to_basics rather then Back To Basics.
